markdownRemark.html:
Summation of primes

The sum of the primes below 10 is 2 + 3 + 5 + 7 = 17. Find the sum of all the primes below two million.

Well, now I can use this without resolve, time for the Sieve of Eratosthenes!

{% highlight javascript %} function summedSievePrimes(n){ var arr = []; var primes = [2]; for(var i=0; i<n; i++){ arr[i] = true; } arr[0] = false; arr[1] = false; arr[2] = false; for(var i=3; i<n;i+=2){ if(arr[i] !== false){ arr[i] = false; primes.push(i); for(var j=i; j<n;j+=i){ arr[j] = false; } } } return primes.reduce(function(acc, val, index, arr){return acc += val}); }

console.log(sievePrimes(2000000)) {% endhighlight %}
